org.webcurator.core.harvester.agent
Interface HarvestAgent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHarvestAgent, HarvestAgentHeritrix, HarvestAgentSOAPClient, HarvestAgentSOAPService
public interface HarvestAgent

The HarvestAgent is the interface used by the HarvestCoordinator to control the HarvestAgent and its individual Harvesters. This interface assumes that the profile sent is for a Heritrix Web Crawler.

Author:
nwaight

Field Summary
static int FAILED_ON_CREATE_INDEX
          Harvest complete processing failed to create the harvest index.

          Harvest complete processing failed to send arc files to the digital asset store.

static int FAILED_ON_SEND_RPTS
          Harvest complete processing failed to send report files to the digital asset store.
static int NO_FAILURES
          Harvest complete processing was successful.
